report.title: Individuals record attributes for verification
report.description: Report used to retrieve custom attributes of a record for the verification 3 prebuilt form when showing records that have associated individuals information.
report.query:
select o.id, 'Record' as attribute_type, a.system_function, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN 'Text'::bpchar WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN 'Lookup List'::bpchar WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN 'Integer'::bpchar WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN 'Boolean'::bpchar WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN 'Float'::bpchar WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN 'Specific Date'::bpchar WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN 'Vague Date'::bpchar ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join occurrence_attribute_values av on av.occurrence_id=o.id and av.deleted=false join occurrence_attributes a on a.id=av.occurrence_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false
union
select o.id, 'Parent sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN 'Text'::bpchar WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN 'Lookup List'::bpchar WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN 'Integer'::bpchar WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN 'Boolean'::bpchar WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN 'Float'::bpchar WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN 'Specific Date'::bpchar WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN 'Vague Date'::bpchar ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join sample_attribute_values av on av.sample_id=s.parent_id and av.deleted=false join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and a.system_function<>'cms_user_id'
union
select o.id, 'Sample' as attribute_type, a.system_function, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN 'Text'::bpchar WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN 'Lookup List'::bpchar WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN 'Integer'::bpchar WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN 'Boolean'::bpchar WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN 'Float'::bpchar WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN 'Specific Date'::bpchar WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN 'Vague Date'::bpchar ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join sample_attribute_values av on av.sample_id=o.sample_id and av.deleted=false join sample_attributes a on a.id=av.sample_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false and a.system_function<>'cms_user_id'
union
select o.id, 'Subject observation' as attribute_type, a.system_function, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN 'Text'::bpchar WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN 'Lookup List'::bpchar WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN 'Integer'::bpchar WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN 'Boolean'::bpchar WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN 'Float'::bpchar WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN 'Specific Date'::bpchar WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN 'Vague Date'::bpchar ELSE a.data_type END AS data_type, a.caption, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN lookup.term::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS value, CASE a.data_type WHEN 'T'::bpchar THEN av.text_value WHEN 'L'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'I'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'B'::bpchar THEN av.int_value::character varying::text WHEN 'F'::bpchar THEN av.float_value::character varying::text WHEN 'D'::bpchar THEN av.date_start_value::character varying::text WHEN 'V'::bpchar THEN (av.date_start_value::character varying::text || ' - '::text) || av.date_end_value::character varying::text ELSE NULL::text END AS raw_value from occurrences o join occurrences_subject_observations oso on oso.occurrence_id=o.id and oso.deleted=false join subject_observation_attribute_values av on av.subject_observation_id=oso.subject_observation_id and av.deleted=false join subject_observation_attributes a on a.id=av.subject_observation_attribute_id and a.deleted=false left join cache_termlists_terms lookup on lookup.id=av.int_value where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false
union
select o.id, 'Identifiers' as attribute_type, null as system_function, 'Text'::bpchar as data_type, idtype.term as caption, i.coded_value as value, i.coded_value as raw_value from occurrences o join occurrences_subject_observations oso on oso.occurrence_id=o.id and oso.deleted=false join identifiers_subject_observations iso on iso.subject_observation_id=oso.subject_observation_id and iso.deleted=false join identifiers i on i.id=iso.identifier_id and i.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms idtype on idtype.id=i.identifier_type_id where o.id=#occurrence_id# and o.deleted=false

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load
